channel.title: [PI]When i eat i get invisible VIDEO [PI]
channel.description: As you can see in this video i always become invisible when im eating and running! any ideas ? [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1w1S5TFo-gA[/youtube]

item.title: [PI]When i eat i get invisible VIDEO [PI]
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

This is simple. Go in your action handler and search for one of the foods id now change it to where it refills your health to a certain amount. But make sure it doesn’t change your hit points level. Not sure but I think one of the rules are that your suppose to at least try to fix it before you ask a question. If you can’t figure it out then just provide the code for when you click on food and I’ll look at it.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]When i eat i get invisible VIDEO [PI]
